play.name: play
play.example: `%splay Maryam 'Yousef Noah'`, `%splay Al-Hajj Al-Minshawi hafs`, `%splay 'Al-Imran' Al-Ajmy`
play.description: This command plays a specific Surah with a specific reciter, if any

search.name: search
search.example: `%ssearch reciters Al-Ajmy`, `%ssearch reciters Al-Minshawi`, `%ssearch suras Al-Hajj`
search.description: Searches for a query in the specified field (reciters, suras)

stop.name: stop
stop.description: Stops recitation of the current Surah

help.name: help
help.description: Introduces you to commands and how to use them
